meanings.definition: A microorganism that converts nitrates into nitrogen gas.
meanings.sent1: The denitrifier in the soil helps in changing nitrates into nitrogen gas.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the denitrifiers in water bodies to understand their role in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The denitrifier at the wastewater treatment plant had a big job to do.
meanings.sent4: The denitrifier worked tirelessly, transforming nitrates like a magician into nitrogen gas.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the denitrifier looked like a tiny superhero battling nitrates.

meanings.definition: A denitrifying agent that removes nitrates from a substance or environment.
meanings.sent1: The farmer used a denitrifier to reduce the nitrate levels in the soil.
meanings.sent2: Environmental engineers introduced a denitrifier to clean up the polluted river.
meanings.sent3: The denitrifier in the chemical solution was the hero of the experiment.
meanings.sent4: Like a skilled cleaner, the denitrifier swept away the harmful nitrates from the water.
meanings.sent5: The denitrifier acted as a silent guardian, purifying the environment from excess nitrates.
